author: lukas
content: i also got the same problem.... i cant even recall when i subscribed to YES.. maybe about 3 years ago..but i stopped using it after a year because the quota finished very fast.. when I ask YES, they said i need to pay the full remaining bill amount eventho i want to terminate earlier due to 2 years contract......... i didnt use it for the remaining 1 year... now they ask me to pay 700+.. i'm still unemployed how can i pay that amount to them.. they said wanna blacklist my name..... omg what should i do?????? they will only blacklist in telco service only or ALL BANK LOAN APPLICATION TOO???? haiz im very regret subscribed to YES... never say YES to YES...
